case 881: // Portal To Verac teleportToX = 3557; teleportToY = 3297; sendMessage("You climb down the hole into Verac's Tomb"); break;[/quote]
But I need to change the height underground.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2008, 05:00:20 pm[/size][hr]Please I need help

item.title: Portal help
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

I’m making a portal that will go to the Barrows brothers tomb rooms but I can’t get the portal to change height. This is the code for the Case case 881: // Portal to Verac heightlevel -= -1 teleportToX = 3557; teleportToY = 3297; sendMessage("You climb down the hole into Verac's tomb."); break;
Then When i compile it, it gives me an error that the heightlevel code is incorrect. Any help here?

Read full topic
